item.title: How to Install Samba Server on Linux Mint 20.2
item.description: Video Links Steps Update your System Install Samba Server Create a Share Testing the Server Finish Video Hi all, in this video i will show how to install Samba Server on Linux Mint 20.2. I hope you enjoy! Links Linux Mint Steps #1. Update your System $ sudo apt update $ sudo apt upgrade #2.
